lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cominco's share of production was 43,000 short tons of copper contained in concentrate, 1,200 short tons of Molybdenum in concentrate, 340,000 ounces of silver and 800 ounces of gold, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: <Teck Corp> said it was continuing talks about joining a joint copper venture at Highland Valley, British Columbia, held by affiliates Cominco Ltd <CLT> and <Lornex Mining Corp>, but did not know when negotiations would be completed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A consortium, 50 pct owned by Teck and 25 pct each by MIM (Canada) Inc and Metallgesellschaft Canada Ltd, acquired its Cominco stake last year from Canadian Pacific Ltd <CP>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cominco's share of production was 43,000 short tons of copper contained in concentrate, 1,200 short tons of Molybdenum in concentrate, 340,000 ounces of silver and 800 ounces of gold, he said.

lst.str: said it was continuing talks about joining a joint copper venture at Highland Valley, British Columbia, held by affiliates Cominco Ltd and <Lornex Mining Corp>, but did not know when negotiations would be completed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A consortium, 50 pct owned by Teck and 25 pct each by MIM (Canada) Inc and Metallgesellschaft Canada Ltd, acquired its Cominco stake last year from Canadian Pacific Ltd .
